p: When comparing sterol composition in the different seed components, the relative percentage of stigmasterol should be noted ( Table 2, Table 3 and Table 4), heart 2.80%, kernel 11.31% and seed coat 4.09%. This result differs from the reported value of stigmasterol in Runner peanuts as 11.0% [ 18]. However, the kernel is the largest component of the seed by mass, and as a result, would more closely reflect data on the entire seed.
